title: Mastering the Learning Design Process with Digital Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Enhancing customized learning design capabilities for working professionals in language education

learning_goals: Explain digital tool utilization strategies for each of the three stages (analysis, design, development) of the instructional design process with 80% accuracy.
Complete a learner analysis → activity design → assessment-linked project using a Pedagogical Planner-like tool.
When selecting digital learning design tools, decision-making criteria can be presented that balance a structured guide with flexibility.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
